Virt-Maker v1 Has Been Launched!

06 May 2024

After nearly a decade of fiddling and transforming the project, I am proud to announce the launch of Virt-Maker v1! Virt-Maker is a project that allows you to create virtual machines with a simple build specs. It is designed to be simple to use and easy to understand. It is also designed to be extensible and flexible. The project is written in Python and is open-source. Check it out at https://github.com/JosiahKerley/virt-maker and let me know what you think!
